QuestData.Title: The Missing Manifest
QuestData.Description: The water-proofed manifest contains some form of code for the most part, hiding the contents of the actual manifest. In the corner is a hastily scrawled note for a Mr. Knuckles. "Shipment attacked, got away but boat is sinking. Get here before they do."$b$bThere are coordinates after that which lead to the sunken boat. Mr. Knuckles is definitely the kind of person you want owing you a favor, not the other way around.
